preqs: 48 credit points from any Monash degree
description: This unit introduces students to the specific skills, demands, practices and opportunities in advertising.  A series of assigned projects involving press, print, signage and television applications, students explore the parameters, opportunities and constraints of these various contexts. Students are expected to develop basic skills in all areas of advertising including, concept creation, visualisation, copy writing and art direction. The ethics of practice and the moral responsibility of advertising are actively discussed and debated.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
